Title: Local Bank Announces Record Profits
Text: XYZ Bank, headquartered in Chennai, today announced record profits for the quarter, largely attributed to increased lending in the tech sector. Analysts predict continued growth into the new year.

Title: Monsoon Retreat Delayed in Southern India
Text: The Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) reported a significant delay in the withdrawal of the northeast monsoon across Tamil Nadu and Andhra Pradesh, impacting rice crop yields.

Title: City Football Club Signs New Midfielder
Text: Chennai Tigers FC officially announced the signing of veteran midfielder Rohan Sharma on a three-year contract, promising a boost to the team's offense ahead of the final tournament.

Title: New AI Tool Detects Fake News
Text: Researchers at IIT Madras have successfully developed a new Artificial Intelligence tool capable of detecting deep-fake news articles with 98% accuracy. The tool uses a combination of sentiment analysis and natural language processing.

Title: Global Markets React to Oil Price Surge
Text: International stock exchanges witnessed volatility today as crude oil prices surged past $90 a barrel following political unrest in the Middle East. Energy stocks saw major gains.

Title: SpaceX Launches Prototype Mars Rover
Text: A prototype rover designed by the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) was successfully launched aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket from the coast of Florida early Wednesday morning.

Title: Supreme Court Upholds Privacy Law
Text: The Supreme Court of India delivered a landmark ruling today, upholding the constitutional validity of the new Digital Personal Data Protection Act, strengthening consumer data rights.
